#### Service Requirements

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites qualified contractors to submit bids for bridge control replacement and electrical repair services at the LaSalle Causeway Bascule Bridge in Kingston, Ontario. The successful contractor must complete the work according to the Drawings and Specifications, and shall perform and complete the work by 31 October 2024.

#### Submission Requirements

Bids must be submitted electronically by 2:00 PM EDT on 11 May 2023. All required supporting documentation must accompany the bid. Failure to meet the submission deadline will render the bid non-responsive.

#### Security Clearance

Please note that this solicitation contains a security clearance requirement. The contractor must have the required security clearance before being able to access the Specifications and drawings.

#### Drawings and Specifications

The Specifications and drawings will only be made available after the Bidder has signed the Non-disclosure Agreement in Appendix 5, due to confidentiality reasons.
